channel.title: Running Gradle task 'assembleDebug' on まぁそういう時もある
channel.description: Recent content in Running Gradle task 'assembleDebug' on まぁそういう時もある

item.title: Running Gradle task 'assembleDebug' forever...
item.description:
When I developed flutter app on android, I encountered problem that shows “Running Gradle task ‘assembleDebug’” forever.
I share how to solve this problem.
